infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: pawpawStory uses your microphone to record your voice for creating personalized story narrations. For example, you can record yourself reading a short passage, and the app will use your voice to narrate bedtime stories for your children.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: pawpawStory uses your camera to take a profile photo. This photo will be displayed on your profile page to personalize your account.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: pawpawStory accesses your photo library so you can select an existing photo for your profile picture. The selected photo will be displayed on your profile page.
